messages.title: 7,500 Haringey pensioners to be exempt from Income Tax
messages.content: Lib Dem pledge to raise income tax threshold to £10,000. Pensioners and lower income families to benefit.

messages.title: 24 HOUR POLICING SUCCESS
messages.content: A Promise of more to come

messages.title: SCHOOL FAIR FUNDING FIGHT CONTINUES
messages.content: MP’s face-to-face fight against unfairness ahead of funding consultation launch

messages.title: TRUTH ON IRAQ
messages.content: Liberal Democrats demand publication of war documents

messages.title: TORY VOTE WASTED
messages.content: Labour duo cling onto the control of council. It's Lib Dem here! Tactical voting ineffective.

messages.title: 16 MONTHS OF RECYCLING FAILURE
messages.content: Calendar of recycling target missed by Haringey Council

messages.title: LABOUR MINISTER WASHES HANDS OF A&E CLOSURE
messages.content: Lib Dems force admission: majority of operations AXE 24 hours are scheduled at Barnet.

messages.title: COUNCIL ON A KNIFE EDGE
messages.content: Control of Haringey Council to be decided on just over 4% of the vote. Lib Dem increase their chance in Haringey after a recent landslide victory in Stroud Green.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The first £10,000 you earn tax-free, benefiting 7,500 pensioners in Haringey.
A commitment to providing continuous police presence.
Tackling unfair funding issues in school education.
Demanding the publication of war-related documents and transparency.
Addressing failures in recycling targets set by Haringey Council.
Opposing the closure of Accident and Emergency departments.
Striving for control of Haringey Council and addressing closeness of vote.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dem here! Tactical voting ineffective in this area.

issues.education: MP fights against unfairness in school funding ahead of funding consultation launch.
issues.environment: 16 months of recycling failure by Haringey Council.
issues.governance: Lib Dem increase their chance in Haringey after recent victory in Stroud Green. Labour duo cling onto control of council.
issues.health: Lib Dems force admission: majority of operations AXE 24 hours are scheduled at Barnet.
